description: When a bottom sheet is generated one of the boilerplate tasks is to add the type to BottomSheetType class for the new bottom sheet. This modification performs that action.
error: It seems your file for BottomSheetType class is not in lib/enums/bottom_sheet_type.dart. Add a stacked.json file and set the path for \'bottom_sheet_type_enums\' to the folder so we can locate your BottomSheetType class.
name: Add \'{{sheetType}}\' type to BottomSheetType
